about_the_game:
Welcome to Neonscape. The simulation awaits, beckoning warriors like you to prove their mettle and etch their names into the annals of glory.

Enter the Simulation

Immerse yourself in the captivating world of Neonscape, a thrilling battle simulation that thrusts you into the shoes of Onyx, a formidable warrior harnessing the extraordinary power of the Black Lotus. Prepare to face relentless waves of enemies as you embark on an adrenaline-charged journey like no other.

Master the Power of Karma

Combat in Neonscape is a symphony of skill and strategy, where mastering the art of Karma is paramount. Unleash the potent abilities bestowed upon you by the Black Lotus, slicing through the fabric of space itself to wreak havoc upon your adversaries. Swiftly maneuver the simulation room with finesse, utilizing your advanced reflexes to execute lightning-fast attacks, evasive dodges, expert parries, and gravity-defying wall-runs. Every move you make is crucial in outmaneuvering your opponents and emerging victorious.

Challenge Your Limits

The true test lies in the ultimate question: How long will you survive? Keep track of your progress and challenge yourself to beat your personal best! Neonscape features a locally saved score system that allows you to save your hard-earned score and strive for greater achievements. Push your limits and discover the depths of your abilities as you strive for greatness within the confines of your own achievements.

name: Neonscape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2080
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Embrace Onyx, the master of the Black Lotus, in intense first-person hack n' slash combat. Maneuver compact battlegrounds, unleash spatial manipulation, and showcase unmatched agility. How long can you survive the relentless waves? Brace for an adrenaline-pumping test of mettle!
